meanings.definition: Attempt to sell (something) by pestering people in an aggressive or bold manner.
meanings.sent1: The street vendor touts his wares loudly to attract customers.
meanings.sent2: The company touts its new product through social media ads.
meanings.sent3: The persistent salesman touts his items even in his sleep.
meanings.sent4: She touts her skills like a champion showcasing a trophy.
meanings.sent5: The aggressive marketer touts the benefits of the product with enthusiasm.

meanings.definition: Advertise or promote in a persistent or aggressive manner.
meanings.sent1: The politician touts his achievements during every speech.
meanings.sent2: The brand touts its eco-friendly practices in all its commercials.
meanings.sent3: The enthusiastic cheerleader touts her team's victory before the game even starts.
meanings.sent4: The artist touts her latest masterpiece like a precious gem.
meanings.sent5: The company touts its services as the best in town, drawing in many customers.

meanings.definition: A person who solicits business or employment in a persistent or aggressive manner.
meanings.sent1: The persistent tout outside the stadium sells tickets at high prices.
meanings.sent2: The aggressive tout on the street hands out flyers for the new restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The eager tout at the job fair impresses potential employers with his confidence.
meanings.sent4: The ambitious tout in the market stands out like a shining star.
meanings.sent5: The enthusiastic tout at the convention attracts attention with his persuasive skills.
